headline: Trump EPA Moves Warm Coal Stocks, Tap Brakes For These S&P 500 Firms
summary: Deregulation by President Trump's EPA is boosting coal stocks but has hit the brakes on orders for heavy duty truck builders.

raw.headline: Trump EPA Moves Warm Coal Stocks, Tap Brakes For These S&P 500 Firms
raw.summary: Deregulation by President Trump's EPA is boosting coal stocks but has hit the brakes on orders for heavy duty truck builders.

headline: Paccar Faces Demand Uncertainty Amid Policy, Market Risks, UBS Says
summary: Paccar (PCAR) is unlikely to see a rebound in truck demand in the second half of 2025 due to policy
